name: Wen777.GitHub.io
body:
## About Shih Wen-Hsiang
I'm a back-end developer also a entrepreneur. I am familiar with B2B software market and have ever pushed a digital product Agilearning to enterprise market with three partners and got two paying customers.

Familiar with:
- Node.js, Python, Golang.
- MongoDB, SeaweedFS

### Talk

* [MUPX meets Docker](http://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/227983104/), Meteor Taipei meetup, January 26, 2016
[Slide](http://slides.com/swhsiang/deck-7)

* [Test Meteor on Travis](http://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/226366012/), Meteor Taipei meetup, Nov 18, 2015
[Slide](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1aqIR_NUdfVjbgRUUzCoMz74togrMZQ4yVQE03DfXhNw/edit?usp=sharing)

### Project

* Software developer (Back-end)
#### [Kaneoh](http://www.garageplus.asia/zh/node/964), enterprise solution, 2015/11 - current
  * Design and implement a message system which can let people communicate across the intranet. The dependencies of the message system are nodejs, nsq(queue), AWS S3.
  * A [Slack robot](http://i.imgur.com/CfiQOpT.png) which can listen command from slack channel and automatically deploy. Written by python.

* Back-end developer
#### [Agilearning](http://agilearning.io/), online coding environment hosting service, 2014/12 - 2015/02
Deployed Agilearning to Google Cloud, Digital Ocean, and Linode. Managed hundreds of containers and dozens of servers.  Also wrote the shell script to automatically deploy service. Collaborated with three partners and brought product to market in three months.

* Teaching Assistant
#### [Taiwan Coder League](http://entresoft.org/), student coding group, 2014/09 - 2015/02
TWCL is a nonprofit organization. Founders of TWCL believe that "Software eating the world. Coding is important as same as Math, English, and Science." I joined this project as a teaching assistant and helped more than dozen students debug while there were building their website.

### Education

* #### Department of Communications Engineering, 
Feng Chia University, 2012 - 2014 undergraduate

* #### National Dali Senior High School
2009 - 2012
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
